name: Zomb Shot
description:
This is a new idea for a game jam game where you are in a map with an endless amount of zombies spawning in.

Theme: Don't Stop

Controls

WASD-Move

Left Click-Shoot

Escape-Pause

when you lose you get sent straight to the menu page.

Bug

The way I did the camera movement made it Very hard to clamp camera movement so you can basically do summersaults.
